summary: VEHICLE'S DRIVER SIDE SEAT BELT DEFECTIVE.  *MR  WHEN PUSHED INTO THE SOCKET TO SECURE THE DRIVER, IT WOULD POP OUT AND WOULD NOT REMAIN UNLESS FORCED.  THE BELT WOULD ALSO TIGHTEN AND FIT SNUG TO THE POINT WHERE THE DRIVER WAS UNABLE TO LEAN FORWARD.  (THE CONSUMER WOULD BE UNABLE TO SEE IF ANYONE WAS COMING)  THE DEALER WOULD NOT FIX THE VEHICLE.  *SCC   *JB
